summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer, , and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation. Those features have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer, IMFMediaEngine and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Describes the currently selected button from the DVD highlight information.

member.name: AM_PROPERTY_SPHLI.Reserved
member.summary: Reserved for internal use. Do not use or set.

member.name: AM_PROPERTY_SPHLI.StartX
member.summary: Start x-coordinate pixel of the current highlight button.

member.name: AM_PROPERTY_SPHLI.StartY
member.summary: Start y-coordinate pixel of the current highlight button.

member.name: AM_PROPERTY_SPHLI.StopX
member.summary: Ending x-coordinate pixel of the current highlight button.

member.name: AM_PROPERTY_SPHLI.StopY
member.summary: Ending y-coordinate pixel of the current highlight button.

member.name: AM_PROPERTY_SPHLI.ColCon
member.summary: Color contrast description of type AM_COLCON.
